gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.dragdrop
Interface HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
TargetTreeDragTransferHandler, TreeDefaultDragTransferHandler
public interface HL7SDKDragCompatibleComponent

This interface defines functionality that should be implemented in the class that would support drag function. These functions will give access to both DragGestureAdapter and DragSourceAdapter for initiating and confirming drag action, updating status, and fetching tranferable data, etc..

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:03 $
Author:
OWNER: Scott Jiang, LAST UPDATE $Author: marwahah $

Method Detail

move

void move()
Called by the DragSourceAdapter in dragDropEnd if the operation is DnDConstants.ACTION_MOVE

getDragAction

int getDragAction()
What are the drag actions supported by this component. Could be DnDConstants.ACTION_MOVE, DnDConstants.ACTION_COPY or DnDConstants.ACTION_COPY_OR_MOVE. Called by the DragSourceAdapter in dragDropEnd and the DragGestureAdapter in dragGestureRecognized

getDragStartData

java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable getDragStartData(java.awt.dnd.DragGestureEvent e)
Called by the DragGestureAdapter in dragGestureRecognized

getDragSourceListener

java.awt.dnd.DragSourceListener getDragSourceListener()
Called by the DragGestureAdapter in dragGestureRecognized. This is the listener that is registered with the drag source in the startDrag method.

Returns:
usually the DragSourceAdapter

isStartDragOk

boolean isStartDragOk(java.awt.dnd.DragGestureEvent e)
Is the location within the component draggable? Called by the DragGestureAdapter in dragGestureRecognized. If false is returned then there will be no drag initiated.

setInDragDropMode

void setInDragDropMode(boolean flag)
Because when a drag is over a component, a selection listener would be notified as if there were an item being selected. These two function will allow DropTargetAdapter to notify the selection listener(s) of the drop target component if the drag comes or the actual selection occurs.

isInDragDropMode

boolean isInDragDropMode()
Answers if current component is under dragging mode.

Returns:
if current component is under dragging mode.
